column4: Hi room. I have been working on getting my wireless connection up and running in UbuntuStudio. I have an HP DV6646US laptop and it has a broadcom wireless. I have been on the forums and I have downloaded a bunch of stuff, but it still won't work. I have tried Network Manager, but it doesn't recognize my wireless connection. Any ideas+
It would help to know what all you have done to try and get it to work.. as in scripts like automatix or envy (both very bad ideas)
which screensaver.. and are you running effects?
Does it happen with effects turned off
